name: Grammarly
description: Improve your writing with Grammarly's AI-powered grammar checker and writing assistant.

name: LastPass
description: Securely store passwords and access them from anywhere with LastPass password manager.

name: Adblock Plus
description: Block annoying ads and pop-ups for a cleaner browsing experience with Adblock Plus.

name: Pocket
description: Save articles, videos, and web pages to read later with Pocket's convenient bookmarking feature.

name: Dark Reader
description: Enable dark mode on websites to reduce eye strain and improve readability with Dark Reader extension.

name: Honey
description: Automatically find and apply coupon codes at checkout to save money while shopping online with Honey extension.

name: Bitwarden
description: Store and manage passwords securely with Bitwarden password manager extension.

name: Todoist
description: Organize tasks and manage your to-do lists efficiently with Todoist task manager extension.

name: The Great Suspender
description: Automatically suspend inactive tabs to save memory and improve browser performance with The Great Suspender extension.

name: Evernote Web Clipper
description: Clip web pages, save articles, and capture content for easy organization in Evernote with the Web Clipper extension.
